channel.title: need villagers and tips
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "need villagers and tips" - i need villagers-we are the third smallest village in the game!

item.title: need villagers and tips
item.content:encoded:
Please join wolvefang village! if you post your name here ill automatically accept you!

also, im new at leading a village so does anyone have any tips?

and what is peace/how do you get it?
